entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Ucluelet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 1:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
